Primary Contact: Diane Merenick, Chief Bylaw Enforcement Officer; Phone: 250.469.6284; Fax: 250.860.9388
Service Details: - Works with, supports and encourages responsible dog ownership across the entire Regional District- Provides licenses and permanent identification for dogs- Enforces the Responsible Dog Ownership Bylaw No. 1343- Maintains and operates the Regional Dog Pound Facility for lost or found dogs- All dog licenses in the Central Okanagan expire December 31 in every calendar year and must be renewed before February 28 the following year- License fees before March 1st - Fixed: $20, Not Fixed: $60- License fees March 1st: Fixed: $40, Not Fixed: $80- Owners of unlicensed dogs may be subject to a fine of $300
Address & Map: Regional Dog Pound Facility890 Weddell PlKelowna, BC     V1Y 7G6
